title: What are some natural ant killers? - Quora

response.answer_text: I find that if I mixed equal amounts of “Borax” with something sweet honey jam or any other sweet. I find that if I used bottle caps for containers placed at the nest or along their trail. They will take this into their nest and eventually the queen will consume some. When this concoction is ingested it will bloat and eventually kill the ant and all those that consume it. It may take a few days to see results.
